entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-11-16
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Blazor app using BouncyCastle encryption is broken by AOT in the latest .NET9.0 update #109894
  • [NativeAOT] AccessViolationException when making reflection calls over DIMs #109893
  • Error reading exported certificate private key on some machines. #109886
  • Step Over sometimes executes a lot more than one statement #109885
  • Unexpected performance difference with strange hack #109884

Closed

  • Deserialize of DateOnly in System.Text.Json 9.0.0 returns incorrect date and year #109892
  • Unsafe accessors do not appear to work with properties and fields of generic types #109890
  • [NativeAOT] Blazor Hybrid + Windows Forms event bindings after AOT compilation #109888
  • Internal CLR error 0x80131506 when running the test for System.Private.CoreLib #109865
  • ILCompiler produces wrong code for calli on x64 platform #109883
  • Contains extension method on arrays is resolved from MemoryExtensions instead of Linq breaking EF queries #109869
  • [9.0][wasm] Wasi.Build.Tests.HttpTests.HttpBuildThenRunThenPublish expects Microsoft.NETCore.App.Runtime.Mono.wasi-wasm/9.0.1-ci but using 9.0.1 #109625
  • [release/9.0][wasi/wasm] SimpleBuildDoesNotFail compares with the wrong expected value #108938
    9.0.0
  • [release/9.0][wasi/wasm] Expected the multithreading runtime pack to be available when running on CI (after branch stabilization) #108937
    9.0.0
  • [9.0][wasm] Wasm.Build.NativeRebuild.Tests.FlagsChangeRebuildTests.ExtraEmccFlagsSetButNoRealChange fails: xpected the multithreading runtime pack to be available when running on CI #109626
  • 'RuntimeType.TypeHandle' throws 'NotSupportedException' on NativeAOT after publishing with 0 ILC warnings #109496

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix length check for Convert.TryToHexString{Lower} #109891
    area-System.Runtime, community-contribution
  • `TensorPrimitives` XML docs: `MinNumber`/`ReciprocalSqrt`/`ReciprocalSqrtEstimate` oversights #109889
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • Remove more HelperMethodFrames (HMF) from Reflection #109882
    area-VM-coreclr, 10.0.0

Merged

  • Fix obtaining type handles of IDynamicInterfaceCastableImplementation #109875
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Add cpio to Codespaces Dockerfiles #109817
    needs-area-label

Updated

  • Fix failing test on NativeAOT #109853
    area-Tracing-coreclr
  • Disable some chrome-DebuggerTests that are crashing with DeadLetter #109871
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • win32: add fallback to environment vars for system folder #109673
    area-System.Runtime, os-windows-nano, community-contribution
  • [8.0] Guard against empty Accept address #108334
    area-System.Net.Sockets, os-mac-os-x, 8.0.x
  • Fix dataflow analysis for GetNestedType #109814
    new-api-needs-documentation, linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink
  • Unhandled exception handler. #109806
    area-ExceptionHandling-coreclr
  • DATAS BGC thread synchronization fix #109804
    area-GC-coreclr
  • [WIP] Numerical ordering for string compare/equals/hashcode #109861
    area-System.Globalization, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Detect mask usage for Across functions #109218
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arm-sve

entry.title: dotnet/runtimelab - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-11-16
entry.content:
PullRequests

Created

  • awaits of Task-returning methods from async2 are done as thunk calls. #2781

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-11-16
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • dotnet watch records new non-code files #44910
  • dotnet watch run completely broken for F# #44908
  • You need to take back charge of your Linux packaging #44901

PullRequests

Created

  • Apply xunit configuration to all tests for better test failure diagnostics #44907
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Factor Hot Reload agent implementation into a source package #44899
    untriaged, Area-AspNetCore

Updated

  • Enable test timeout dump collection #44730
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Support publishing of multi-architecture OCI container images #43085
    DO NOT MERGE, Area-Containers
  • Clean up namespaces #44691
    untriaged
  • Enable Signing in Repos that Override Build Actions #44855
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update implicit versions and to GA #44834
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • tool-install: Avoid duplicate sources #44853
    untriaged, Area-Tools

entry.title: dotnet/csharplang - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-11-16
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Repo Reorganization In Progress #8596

PullRequests

Created

  • Dictionary expressions: add rules for type inference and overload resolution #8598

Merged

  • Update dictionary-expressions.md #8597
  • Update dictionary-expressions.md #8595
  • Add open question about span conversions in expression trees #8592

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-11-16
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Improved async value retrieval #75942

Closed

  • Roslyn doesn't handle dealing with an overrflow of the file change service buffer #56023
    17.13 P2
  • VS highlights issues after git pull #75922

PullRequests

Created

  • Add a couple common type sizes to SegmentedArrayHelper's size/shift/offsetmask methods so those values can be inlined. #75944
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Reuse segments during SegmentedDictionary growth #75943
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • VB Overload Resolution Priority - handle operators and respect language version #75941
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Feature - Overload Resolution Priority

Merged

  • Send over the new sourcetext's content checksum when sending notification of textchanges #75928
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • VB: Check overload resolution priority for basic scenarios involving methods #75862
    Area-Compilers, Feature - Overload Resolution Priority, 17.13 P2
  • Reduce IVsFreeThreadedFileChangeEvents2.DirectoryChangedEx2 notifications from VS shell #75815
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • Add server side support for refreshing source generated files #75939
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode, Next

Updated

  • Null-conditional assignment 1 #75821
    Area-Compilers, VSCode, New Feature - Null Conditional Assignment, 17.13 P2
  • Improve performance on `SymbolCompletionProviderTests` #75496
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged
  • Reduce allocations by creating an array builder class that allows span usage #75940
    Area-Analyzers, untriaged
  • Clear hoisted locals when disposing iterator and async-iterator state machines #75908
    Area-Compilers, untriaged

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-11-16
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Perf improvement: mvc #59005
  • .NET9: hot reload failed #59004
  • Static assets not working in ASP.NET Core MVC Views #59003
  • Register, Log In component Issues - .NET9 #58997
  • .NET 9: `dotnet user-jwts` not working #58996

Closed

  • Perf improvement: json_middleware #58998
  • [Razor class library (RCL)] Enable the automatic import of arbitrary CSS files into consumer project. #58974
  • 'IServiceCollection' does not contain a definition for 'AddIdentity' and no accessible extension method 'AddIdentity' #58979
  • The default mvc web application template navigation menu created by. net 9 does not display #59000
  • cas #59001
  • kes #59002
  • Quirkiness of Blazor Server Apps deployed on Hosted IIS VM on Azure #58956
  • Perf improvement: json #58927
  • Perf improvement: json, json, mvc #58960
  • Perf regression: multiple_queries, single_query #58992
  • Identity Api Endpoint Route Builder Extensions #58994

PullRequests

Updated

  • QuickGrid: Add EventCallback<TGridItem> for clicking on a row. #55851
    area-blazor, community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun
  • Hot Reload agent improvements #58333
    area-blazor

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-11-16
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • VS upgrade to 17.12 fails to recognize iOS simulators from XCode 16.1 #25904
  • [9.0, GA, Android] An Android Button Minimum Size is Enforced #25903
  • .NET MAUI BLAZOR v.8 unable connect to the api with the http url #25901
  • Upgrading to .NET 9 cause build time too long #25900
  • PublishReadyToRun no longer working #25899
  • .NET MAUI 9 does not support Android 14.0 (API 34) #25898
  • Setting MenuFlyoutSubItem IconImageSource throws a NullReferenceException #25893
    .NET 9 SR1.1
  • .NET MAUI Binding issue CS0103: There is no context exist here | .NET 9 Core #25891

Closed

  • iOS Release pipelines taking an hour #25022

PullRequests

Created

  • [housekeeping] Try run template tests on arm64 #25895
  • [Android] Span with tail truncation and paragraph breaks with Java.Lang.IndexOutOfBoundsException - fix #25892
    platform/android 🤖, community ✨, area-controls-label

Updated

  • [Android] Page.IsBusy activity indicators gets stuck/causes multiple to be displayed #23745
    platform/android 🤖, area-navigation
  • Fixed Keyboard Scrolling in editors with Center or End VerticalTextAlignment is off #25827
    community ✨, area-keyboard, area-controls-editor
  • made FilterQuality configurable for Resizetizer #25686
    community ✨, .NET 9 SR1.1
  • Fixed CollectionView SelectedItem binding issue on initial loading #25555
    platform/windows 🪟, platform/iOS 🍎, area-controls-collectionview, community ✨, .NET 9 SR1.1
  • CollectionView with EmptyView and EmptyViewTemplate for Data template selector throws an exception #25418
    area-controls-collectionview, community ✨, .NET 9 SR1.1
  • Fix for MenuFlyoutItem stops working after navigating away from and back to page #25170
    community ✨, area-controls-contextmenu, .NET 9 SR1.1
  • TableView title issue fix on iOS and windows platforms. #25414
    platform/windows 🪟, platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-controls-listview, .NET 9 SR2
  • Stepper doesn't change increment value when being bound to a double in MVVM context (Windows) #24396
    community ✨, area-controls-stepper, .NET 9 SR2

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-11-16
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • EF Core 9 migration behaviour change causes exception an exception with surrounding transaction #35127
  • InMemory database context with CustomWebApplicationFactory is giving double database context registration error. How do I implement this correctly? #35126
  • Add a REPL for dotnet-ef #35125

Closed

  • `Entity type 'Entity.Addresses#Address' is mapped to JSON and has a navigation to a regular entity which is not the owner` #35115
  • EF9: single transaction spanning all migrations causes transaction-incompatible SQL to fail #35096
  • Unapply a specific list of migrations #35098
  • Filtered Include with Owned Entities #35112

PullRequests

Created

  • Avoid using `^` and `~` when invalid because of value converters #35124
  • Clean up Cosmos PagingExpression namespace #35123
  • Add missing Converts when simplifying in funcletizer #35122

Merged

  • Update to .NET9 SDK #35119
